name: Between The Lines (Nick Greene, AlecksIO, mjzajac)
name_original: Between The Lines (Nick Greene, AlecksIO, mjzajac)
description:
What would you do if you woke up one morning to find your mom missing?

In Between the Lines,  that is exactly what happens to Camron Thompson, a young man with a disability who is on the search for his missing Native American mother. When no one else is willing to investigate, Camron takes it upon himself to find where she has gone using only his home-phone, his notebook, and Barchester's daily newspaper. 

As Camron, the player must put together the cryptic clues found in the articles and through phone calls with Barchester's locals in order to solve his mother's disappearance. 

Thankfully for the player, that is not the only mystery happening in Barchester. Explore the many articles and stories that fill the small midwestern town. Discover and solve the other local mysteries to help your community.

To learn more about the tragic reality that inspires the main story of this game, refer to these websites:

Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women USA: https://mmiwusa.org/

Native Hope: https://www.nativehope.org/missing-and-murdered-indigenous-women-mmiw
